content: wr1756 - name knit & crochet preemie hats contains both instructions directions are for 3-light yarn and 4-medium yarn our specially-designed cap is seamless so easy and quick to make and extra cozy for even the tiniest baby s head with just a little bit of yarn and a few minutes of your time you can make caps for newborns measurements 11¼ 11 circumference 3-light 4-medium yarn 1 ounce for each hat crochet hook 4mm us g-6 / 5mm us h-8 gauge 17 sts x 10 row = 3 / 13 sts x 6 row = 2½ in pattern original coats & clark pdf 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20150528233318/http //www redheart com/files/patterns/pdf/wr1756 pdf
